scripts.build:proto: mkdir -p lib src/generated && protoc --proto_path=src --plugin="protoc-gen-ts=../../node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto" --ts_opt="useOptionals=all,useExactTypes=false,outputClientImpl=grpc-web" --ts_out="./src/generated" --js_out="import_style=commonjs:./lib" src/service/designer.proto src/notice/base.proto src/ast/pc.proto src/ast_mutate/mod.proto src/ast/css.proto src/ast/graph.proto   src/virt/html.proto  src/ast/base.proto src/virt/module.proto  src/virt/css.proto src/ast/docco.proto src/language_service/pc.proto
